text: Bonifácio José Tamm de Andrada (14 May 1930 - 5 January 2021) was a Brazilian politician, law academic and journalist. He was born in Barbacena, Minas Gerais. He was a member of the Brazilian Social Democracy Party. From 1979 to 2019, he was a member of the Chamber of Deputies. Andrada died on 5 January 2021 in Barbacena from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 90.Obituário: falece o ex-deputado Bonifácio Andrada ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Brazilian academics Category:Brazilian journalists Category:Politicians from Minas Gerais
title: Bonifácio José Tamm de Andrada
